title: Drew Estate Extravaganza!
itunes:title: Drew Estate Extravaganza!
description: On today's Cigar Authority Show Jonathan Drew, owner and founder of Drew Estates, and Steve Saka, Drew Estates President, joins Dave Garofalo, Mr Jonathan and Chuck Morrison as we light up their new "My Uzi Weighs A Ton" and "Undercrown" premium cigars. Jim Robertson from www.thecigarstation.com calls in to talk about his new Cigar Radio Station network. And we also discuss the latest cigars hitting the shelves, a couple banned for fostering a child because of cigars, as well as the World's Largest Scavenger Hunt in which Cigars will play a staring role. It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
